level.heading: Registration of firms of public accountants.
Temporary Repeal of Section
level.text: Section 2(g) of D.C. Law 16-101 repealed this section.
Section 4(b) of D.C. Law 16-101 provides that the act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 2(g) of Non-Health Related Occupations and Professions Licensure Emergency Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-255, January 26, 2006, 53 DCR 763).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2801.
